title: AC Techs, Treasonous Bromance, Obamas and Cardi B., Emmanuel VS Tommy, Are You Smarter Than Tommy, Stalkarazzi Alert, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: AC Techs, Treasonous Bromance, Obamas and Cardi B., Emmanuel VS Tommy, Are You Smarter Than Tommy, Stalkarazzi Alert, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
The show opens with a huge shout out to the AC techs that keep us cool. Trump and Putin got more going on than meets the eye. Michelle and Sasha Obama are with Beyonce and Jay-Z for the On The Run II Tour. Cardi B. is set to keep dominating with more recognition. Are You Smarter Than Tommy? Emmanuel VS Tommy. Drive by my ex stories happens to be hotter than the summit that Trump had with Putin. Fool #2 does the Closing Remarks and gives us a legit reason why Side Piece Insurance is so important. You're gonna wish you had it. Plus much more with the Baddest Radio Show in the Land!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
